# This script contains some steps which are not yet supported
 # by configuration items. Each feature should be back ported to
 # ERP5Configurator as an specific Configuration Item.
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject() 
 
 ## Create new portal tool for Vifib
 if getattr(portal, "portal_certificate_authority", None ) is None:
 portal.manage_addProduct['ERP5'].manage_addTool('ERP5 Certificate Authority Tool', None)
 print "Created portal_certificate_authority"
 else:
 print "portal_certificate_authority already exists."
 
 ## Set Authentification Plugin
 plugin_id = "vifib_auth"
 user_folder = context.acl_users
 if plugin_id not in user_folder.objectIds():
 # check if it's not already created
 user_folder.manage_addProduct['Vifib'].addVifibMachineAuthenticationPlugin(
 id = plugin_id, 
 title = "Vifib Machine Authentication Plugin")
 print "%s Plugin added at acl_users." % plugin_id
 else:
 print "%s Plugin already added added at acl_users." % plugin_id
 
 vifib_plugin = getattr(user_folder, plugin_id)
 vifib_plugin.manage_activateInterfaces(interfaces=['IAuthenticationPlugin',
 'IUserEnumerationPlugin', 
 'IGroupsPlugin', 
 'IExtractionPlugin' ])
 print "Enabled "
